org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.read.stats.pairstat

Class PairIntegerTagListCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.read.stats.pairstat.PairIntegerTagListCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PairEndReadStatFunction<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>,java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean>>, StatFunction<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>,scala.Tuple2<org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead,org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead>>

    public class PairIntegerTagListCounter
extends java.lang.Object
implements PairEndReadStatFunction<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>,java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean>>
    Counts the number of read pairs whose integer SAM tag(s) is compared to a threshold(s).

    If the tag(s) is not present for any of the read pairs, that pair is not included in that tag count.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        First perform validation (non-null and non-empty list arguments, size of the lists are the same) and initialize a list of PairIntegerTagCounter with the arguments.

        Note: for each tag-operation-threshold, the PairIntegerTagCounter constructor might throw IllegalArgumentException if validation fails.
